meanings.definition: Not socialized or trained to behave in a sociable or friendly manner.
meanings.sent1: The puppy was unsocialized and would often hide from visitors.
meanings.sent2: The unsocialized child struggled to make friends at school.
meanings.sent3: The unsocialized cat refused to come out from under the bed, even for treats.
meanings.sent4: Her unsocialized behavior at the party was like a wall blocking any attempts at conversation.
meanings.sent5: The unsocialized plant wilted in the corner, away from the sunlight and water it needed.

meanings.definition: Lacking social skills or the ability to interact with others in a normal or acceptable way.
meanings.sent1: The unsocialized teenager found it hard to make eye contact during conversations.
meanings.sent2: She felt unsocialized in the new group, unsure of how to join their discussions.
meanings.sent3: The unsocialized penguin waddled awkwardly among the more sociable birds.
meanings.sent4: His unsocialized behavior in the office made it difficult for colleagues to approach him.
meanings.sent5: The unsocialized robot stood in the corner, silent and disconnected from the lively party.
